name: Highschool Romance
overview: It's the start of your final year of high school. Because of a crazy mix-up by your parents, you are due to attend an all-girls school. Fortunately, the principal has a solution to this strange crisis. You soon discover that what would have been a dream-come-true to many is actually a lot more complicated. In this unusual situation, can you survive, make friends, or even find love?
